events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit me at all.
The customer's request to return the jacket has been identified as a refund case based on their mention of returning the item and requesting money back.
A customer service agent specializing in returns and refunds has been assigned to handle this case and respond to the customer promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your return and refund process for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for us to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and yes, the jacket is unworn and still in the original packaging as required.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund once we receive the returned jacket. I will email you the prepaid shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the assistance and look forward to receiving the shipping label.
The prepaid shipping label has been sent to your email. Please send the jacket back at your earliest convenience to complete the refund process.
We wanted to follow up to ensure you received the shipping label and to check if you need any further assistance with your return.
Your return has been processed and the refund issued successfully. We are closing this case now, please contact us anytime if you need more help.
